EmailTemplate.description: Notifying Mentee on Mentee's Feedback Completion: Email Template
EmailTemplate.name: Notifying Mentee on KRA Completion
EmailTemplate.subject: Performance: KRA Completion Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Goal__c.Resource__c},
We are happy to inform you that your KRA review has been completed by your mentor {!Goal__c.Check_In_By__c}.
Thank you for your proactive approach to setting and aligning your goals with the mentorship program. Your dedication contributes significantly to our shared success.
Best Regards,
Cloud Peritus Team
